sentence: Ecolab Inc. ( ECL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 18, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.37 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 16, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased ECL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that ECL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $131.01, the dividend yield is 1.13%.
The previous trading day's last sale of ECL was $131.01, representing a -2.88% decrease from the 52 week high of $134.89 and a 18.4% increase over the 52 week low of $110.65.
ECL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
ECL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $4.38.
Zacks Investment Research reports ECL's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 7.93%, compared to an industry average of 11.9%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ECL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
